titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the 40th Bomb Group Association records
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Jackson Shumway, revised by Vishnu Jani

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2015-05-11T16:06-0700
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid is written in English

change.item: May 8, 2015: Revised after circulation July 29, 2014: Added Motion Picture film as an item; Added a second motion picture information in addition to 3 audio cassette tapes' information

did.unittitle: 40th Bomb Group Association records

physdesc.extent: 17 manuscript boxes, 2 motion picture film reels

did.abstract: Correspondence, newsletters, memoirs, and audiovisual material, relating to activities of the 40th Bomb Group in the China-Burma-India and Pacific Theaters during World War II, and to subsequent activities of veterans of the group. Includes photocopies of histories of other World War II American bomb groups

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], 40th Bomb Group Association records, [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1987.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The organization of veterans of the United States Army Air Forces 40th Bomb Group was started in 1980 in order to retain relationships and memories of the 40th Bomb Group's veterans by holding yearly reunions for members.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: The collection relates to activities of the 40th Bomb Group in the China-Burma-India and Pacific Theaters during World War II, and to subsequent activities of veterans of the group. The collection is almost entirely the correspondence of several key members of the association, mostly focused on the organization of annual reunions in the United States after the conclusion of the war and into the 1990s.

The Association also published "War Stories" and "Memories" written by various former members of the 40th about their experiences in the war. This collection contains photographs from the annual reunions after the war as well as material and photographs created during or immediately after the war.
